评论概述: I was hesitant.. but I LOVE THESE
评论详情: I loved these so much!! There not your typical pj pant material though which I didn’t mind, I got these for a camp that I was going to and I wanted some thing that would hold up during dirt boarding, skateboarding, BB guns, etc. And they did! No holes, rips, nothing! They are super Duper comfy, baggy, And they have that grunge look I was going for. I definitely recommend these!!!
